quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you
author: Walt Whitman

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
author: Walt Disney

quote: Write the story thats in your heart, not the one that you think will pay the most
author: Brenda Jackson,author of Forged in Desire

quote: Kindness is the language that deaf can hear and blind can see.

quote: They'll mock don't talk just walk
author: Hussain Lohawala

quote: Love your soul not your body as it is short-lived
